entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 9.

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 8.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning after midnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023
